item.title: 特朗普表示不希望日本成为美国钢铁业东家后，美国钢铁业下跌 10
item.description: 美国钢铁公司股价创下两个月来的最大跌幅，此前一天，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重申了他的一贯立场，即他不希望看到这家钢铁制造商被日本公司所拥有。【原文：United States Steel Corp. shares posted their biggest drop in two months, a day after US President Donald Trump reiterated his long-held position that he doesn’t want to see the steelmaker owned by a Japanese company.】

item.title: 贸易战愈演愈烈，特朗普对中国征收的关税至少已达 145
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对中国进口商品征收的关税目前至少已达 145%。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs on Chinese imports are now at least 145%.】

item.title: NTT 加入人工智能芯片竞赛，瞄准无人机拍摄技术
item.description: 日本电信电话公司（Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp.）表示，它已开发出一种可帮助无人机处理高分辨率视频的芯片，这表明这家国家支持的公司将把更多资源投入到人工智能领域。【原文：Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp. said it’s developed a chip that can help drones process high-resolution videos, a sign of more resources from the state-backed company going into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞典因涉嫌代理冲突罢免最高金融监管机构
item.description: 在因明显的利益冲突而引发持续骚动之后，瑞典政府重新任命了该国金融监管机构的负责人，以确保人们对该监管机构的持续信任。【原文：Sweden’s government reassigned the head of the country’s financial watchdog to ensure continued trust in the regulator after a continued uproar over an apparent conflict of interest.】

item.title: 拜朱的美国贷款人因现金丢失起诉创始人、妻子和高级助手
item.description: 美国贷款机构在美国破产法院起诉了备受争议的印度科技企业家拜朱-拉文德兰（Byju Raveendran）和他的妻子，要求他们为逾 5 亿美元的贷款收益损失承担个人责任。【原文：American lenders sued controversial Indian tech entrepreneur Byju Raveendran and his wife in a US bankruptcy court, seeking to hold them personally responsible for more than $500 million in missing loan proceeds.】

item.title: 特朗普 "眨眼星期三 "之后的下一步行动
item.description:
我们得到什么好东西了吗？【原文：

Did we get anything good?

item.title: 波利耶夫尔将推动各城市削减新房建设税费
item.description: 保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利耶夫尔（Pierre Poilievre）宣布了一项计划，推动各城市削减加拿大新房建设的开发费用。【原文：Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre announced a plan to push cities to cut development charges on new home construction in Canada.】

item.title: 英国央行布里登称英镑走软带来通胀风险
item.description: 英国央行副行长萨拉-布里登（Sarah Breeden）表示，决策者正在关注英镑的潜在走软，以寻找如何应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易战的迹象。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Sarah Breeden said policymakers are monitoring a potential weakening in the pound for signs of how to respond to US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 美联储施密德表示 "正视 "通胀风险
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，如果美国央行行长们被迫在物价稳定目标和充分就业任务之间寻求平衡，他将优先考虑抑制通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said he would prioritize reining in inflation if US central bankers are forced to balance their price stability goal against their mandate for full employment.】

item.title: 美属维尔京群岛因历史原因免征关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统试图重新调整全球贸易秩序，美属维尔京群岛正抓住这一机遇，努力利用其在美国的独特地位。【原文：The US Virgin Islands is eyeing an opportunity to benefit from President Donald Trump’s dramatic attempt to reorder global trade by trying to exploit its unique status within the US.】

item.title: 凯尔-巴斯称美国可能需要经济衰退来重建基础
item.description: 凯尔-巴斯（Kyle Bass）说，美国可能需要经历一次经济衰退，因为它要重新调整全球贸易关系，并试图控制联邦赤字。【原文：Kyle Bass said the US may need to undergo a recession as it reorders its global trade ties and attempts to rein in the federal deficit.】

item.title: 洛根称美联储必须确保关税不会引发持久通胀
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，官员们必须确保关税引发的通胀不会变得更加持久，并警告说，在美国最近发生的通胀之后，美国人对未来物价增长的预期可能会变得脆弱。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said officials must ensure any tariff-induced inflation doesn’t become more permanent, warning that Americans’ expectations for future price growth may be vulnerable following the country’s latest bout of inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普关税政策逆转后，市政债券大幅反弹
item.description: 国家和地方政府债券在连续三天暴跌后，周四跳涨反弹。【原文：State and local government bonds jumped Thursday in a rebound rally, which followed three straight days of plummeting prices.】

item.title: 以下是美国 3 月份 CPI 报告的主要内容
item.description: 以下是周四公布的美国 3 月份 CPI 通胀报告的五大要点：【原文：Here are five key takeaways from the US CPI inflation report for March, released Thursday:】

item.title: 特朗普的威胁使加拿大与美国的关系紧张，加拿大汽车赴美次数骤降 32
item.description: 随着两国关系日趋紧张，加拿大游客正与美国保持距离，而美国曾是他们的首选目的地。【原文：Canadian travelers are keeping their distance from the US, a country that was once their top destination, as tensions between the two nations grow.】

item.title: 关税担忧抵消疲软的 CPI，信贷恐慌加剧
item.description: 由于投资者担心关税对经济的影响，对企业信贷违约的担忧升级，尽管美国的通胀数据显示，在新的征税之前，消费者的负担有所减轻。【原文：Concerns about corporate credit defaults escalated as investors worry about the economic impact of tariffs, even as US inflation data pointed to some relief for consumers prior to new levies.】

item.title: 风险气候武器的时代可能已经到来
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列报道 Primer的这一集中，我们访问了使用地球工程技术为全球变暖寻找银弹的初创公司。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Primer, we visit the startups using geoengineering to find a silver bullet for global warming.

】

item.title: 美国盟友对特朗普关税政策的转变表示欣慰和蔑视
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在最后一刻决定暂停征收一些最激进的关税，全球的贸易伙伴对此既感到欣慰，又感到困惑。【原文：America’s trading partners around the globe reacted with a mixture of relief and bewilderment to President Donald Trump’s eleventh-hour decision to pause some of his most aggressive tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普为何暂停关税，90 天后会发生什么？
item.description: 几周来，唐纳德-特朗普总统一直在推进对进口商品征收新的高额关税的计划，尽管有人警告说这一政策可能会引发经济混乱。4 月 9 日，在全球股市连续多日暴跌之后，他改变了方向。【原文：For weeks, President Donald Trump has plowed ahead with plans to impose steep new tariffs on imports despite warnings that the policy could trigger economic chaos. On April 9, after a multiday plunge in global stock markets, he changed course.】

item.title: 美国通胀在关税影响前意外降温
item.description: 美国 3 月份的基本通胀广泛降温，这表明在广泛征收关税之前，消费者得到了一定程度的宽松，而关税有可能加剧价格压力。【原文：Underlying US inflation cooled broadly in March, indicating some relief for consumers prior to widespread tariffs that risk contributing to price pressures.】

item.title: OPPO 新款 Ultra 手机在拥挤的市场中倚重相机规格
item.description: 中国硬件制造商 OPPO 周四发布了新款 Find X8 Ultra 旗舰手机，在中国高端品牌的相机技术军备竞赛中打响了最新一炮。【原文：Chinese hardware maker Oppo on Thursday unveiled its new Find X8 Ultra flagship phone, firing the latest salvo in a camera-technology arms race among premium Chinese brands.】

item.title: 市场破裂后英格兰银行停止出售长期债券
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发金边债券收益率飙升之后，英格兰银行屈服于市场压力，暂时停止出售其量化紧缩计划下的长期债券。【原文：The Bank of England has temporarily halted the sale of long-dated bonds under its quantitative tightening program, bowing to market pressure after a surge in gilt yields ignited by Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: Temu 取代 Allegro 成为波兰顶级电子商务平台
item.description: Temu 经过两年的扩张，并在营销方面投入巨资，已成为波兰访问量最大的电子商务平台，击败了本地市场 Allegro.eu SA。【原文：Temu has become the most visited e-commerce platform in Poland, dethroning local marketplace Allegro.eu SA after two years of expansion fueled by lavish spending on marketing.】

item.title: 美国贸易战加剧，中国大举采购巴西大豆
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级，购买美国农作物变得不可行，中国大豆压榨商本周抢购了大量巴西大豆。【原文：Chinese soybean crushers scooped up an unusually large amount of Brazilian beans this week as the escalating trade war makes purchases of US crops unviable.】

item.title: 铜业在智利峰会上对关税持悲观态度
item.description:
本周聚集在圣地亚哥的矿工们对贸易征税持观望态度。【原文：

Miners gathering in Santiago this week took a wait-and-see approach to trade levies.

】

item.title: 南非考虑将汽车业激励措施作为关税屏障
item.description: 南非贸易、工业和竞争部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）表示，南非正在考虑提供更多的激励措施来促进汽车生产，因为南非正在权衡抵消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战影响的措施。【原文：South Africa is considering offering additional incentives to boost car production, as it weighs measures to offset the impact of US President Donald Trump’s trade war, said Trade, Industry and Competition Minister Parks Tau.】

item.title: 新兴市场无一幸免于贸易战带来的美元债务损失
item.description: 没有一个新兴市场能幸免于贸易战的影响，迄今为止，每个国家的主权和企业美元债券都出现了亏损。【原文：No emerging market has been spared from the impact of the trade war, with sovereign and corporate dollar-denominated bonds of every country posting losses month to date.】

item.title: 这是否会成为 "特朗普套餐 "的回归？
item.description:
从交易所交易基金可以看出唐纳德-特朗普撤销关税后市场反弹的许多情况。【原文：

Looking at exchange-traded funds can tell us a lot about the market rebound following Donald Trump’s tariff reversal.

】

item.title: 意大利 Clessidra 公司考虑出售软件公司 Impresoft
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Clessidra Private Equity 正在权衡 Impresoft 的各种选择，包括出售这家估值约为 8 亿欧元（约合 8.85 亿美元）的软件公司。【原文：Clessidra Private Equity is weighing options for Impresoft, including a sale that could value the software firm at about €800 million ($885 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Meta 就联邦贸易委员会垄断案准备辩护
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）预告了 Meta 和美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）在法庭上的重要一天，这将对社交媒体巨头的未来产生重大影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner previews an important day in court for Meta and the FTC, with major implications for the future of the social media titan.】
